title: Games would be more enjoyable if they lasted a bit longer
body:
Every game, it's start off slow.. someone snowballs out of control.. one teamfight and inhibitor gone.. surrender@15/20.. (exaggeration but you know what I mean)
 
What? Come on! It would be more fun to have a few more teamfights with full builds :D

3 games now, I spent 15 minutes farming on {{champion:10}} {{champion:75}}  but I don't get to have fun on them

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: I cant be the only one who hates when it lasts longer than 25/30 mins T^T

I think games lasting 40-50 minutes isn't healthy either. It boils down to who gets caught and the whole match feels essentially like an extended coinflip only slightly in your favor if you're a good player.
That's you and your teams fault buddy.
